Detailed Description

A callback that let users do something before the popup window show.

We can use ActionDropDownWidget::setOnPrepareShowListener to register this callback.

The following example demonstrates how to use the IActionDropDownWidgetPrepareShowListener

 ActionDropDownWidgetTest.h
 class MyPrepareShowListener : public gaia::ui::IActionDropDownWidgetPrepareShowListener {
 {
   public:
       MyPrepareShowListener(gaia::core::Page* page);
       virtual ~MyPrepareShowListener();
       virtual void onPrepareShow();
 };

 ActionDropDownWidgetTest.cpp
 MyPrepareShowListener::MyPrepareShowListener(gaia::core::Page* page)
   : IActionDropDownWidgetPrepareShowListener()
 {
 }

 MyPrepareShowListener::~MyPrepareShowListener()
 {
 }

 void MyPrepareShowListener::onPrepareShow() {
 {
    // do something before show.
 }

 void ActionDropDownWidgetTest::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
    gaia::ui::ActionDropDownWidget* mWidget = new gaia::ui::ActionDropDownWidget(static_cast<Page*>(this));
.*
    // Initialize ActionDropDownWidget
    mWidget->setTitle("ActionDropDownWidget");
    StringArray items(3);
    items.replaceAt(String("item 1"), 0);
    items.replaceAt(String("item 2"), 1);
    items.replaceAt(String("item 3"), 2);
    mWidget->setItemListArray(items);

    // Initialize IActionDropDownWidgetPrepareShowListener and add it into the ActionDropDownWidget
    MyPrepareShowListener* mpListener = new MyPrepareShowListener(static_cast<Page*>(this));
    mWidget->setOnPrepareShowListener(mpListener);
 }
